column4: shortly after login my gnome desktop gets freezed. opened windows stay responsive ... but i cannot open new windows or even click on panels. does somebody know whats going on there?
did you increase the visual effects at all. I know that happens sometimes when people try to run the cube on computers that can't handle it
i didn't change anything, execpt installing the regular updates. but my computer runs compiz fine for years, so i guess thats not the problem.
